definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: These agents must secure roads and rooftops4 around the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 这些探员必须戒护场地的外围道路及屋顶。

sentences.english: Shawn and Marlon Wayans According to the movies, FBI agents are always dressing in drag.
sentences.chinese: 通过电影会发现FBI探员经常男扮女装。

sentences.english: CICIG agents had intercepted more than ten thousand of the gang’s fugitive conversations.
sentences.chinese: CICIG探员截获了这伙人一万次以上的短暂对话。

sentences.english: AGENT MOSLEY snaps into action and pulls out his radio.
sentences.chinese: 默斯利探员突然行动拿出对讲机。

sentences.english: Step Four: don all of this and realize I look like an FBI agent.
sentences.chinese: 第四步，穿戴好以后，我觉得我像个FBI探员。

sentences.english: Suddenly, Mason and a group of agents surround them.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，梅森和一队探员包围了他们。

sentences.english: Agent Starling is a deep roller.
sentences.chinese: 史戴琳探员就是那只深沉的鹞鸽。

sentences.english: Agents barged in and shut down production.
sentences.chinese: 探员们闯入工厂并关停了生产线。

sentences.english: Could you connect me with Agent Skylar, please?
sentences.chinese: 你可以帮我接史凯乐探员吗？

sentences.english: FBI anatomized the ashes carefully in order to gather more clues .
sentences.chinese: 为了搜集更多的线索，联邦探员仔细解剖了尸体。

sentences.english: DOGGETT is still directing the agents around him.
sentences.chinese: 道根还在指挥塔周围的探员们。

sentences.english: According to the movies, FBI agents are always dressing in drag.
sentences.chinese: 通过电影会发现FBI探员经常男扮女装。

sentences.english: These agents must secure roads and rooftops4 around the stadium .
sentences.chinese: 这些探员必须戒护场地的周边道路及屋顶。

sentences.english: Rochon didn't put much stock in the agent's warning at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时罗尚未对探员的警告十分置信。

sentences.english: More than 100 detectives have been assigned to the task.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经派遣超过一百名探员进行调查。

sentences.english: We really do want to believe, just like Agent Mulder.
sentences.chinese: 我们真的是很愿意相信，就像特别探员摩德一样。

definition: secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
police department/police station/abbr. of 警察局
police station (abbr. for 警察署[jing3 cha2 shu3])
US Central Intelligence Agency, CIA/abbr. for 中央情報局|中央情报局[Zhong1 yang1 Qing2 bao4 ju2]
